display.title: Longshot
description: &&3Bows&&r are a charged ranged weapon requiring &&3Arrows&&r to fire.
Bows deal up to &&d10x damage when fully charged&&r, with fully charged arrows having a &&3star trail&&r.
Bows can be &&3enchanted&&r to &&dincrease damage&&r, &&dincrease knockback&&r, &&dignite enemies&&r, and &&dcost no arrows&&r.
&&eArrows of Harming&&r deal more damage to &&3living mobs&&r. &&eArrows of Healing&&r deal more damage to &&3undead mobs&&r.
&&7[Fabrication]&&r Arrows travel less slowly underwater, though &&3Tridents&&r are still much faster.
&&3Arrows&&r can also be &&dscavenged from angered skeletons&&r.
